entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 30
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT
